publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6744 Stuart McMillan: Paisley Pipe Band Championship 2010â€”That the Parliament welcomes the Paisley Pipe Band Championship 2010, which takes place on Saturday 24 July at the County Square, Paisley; notes that this is the first time that Paisley will host a pipe band championship and that two competitions will take place, the main competition and a street competition, which will be judged on the performance of bands as they walk down High Street and leave via Gilmour Street; believes that this is a fantastic showcase for the area, and wishes everyone involved every success.

S3M-6744 Paisley Pipe Band Championship 2010 (lodged on 16 July 2010) Stewart Maxwell*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Elaine Smith*, Gil Paterson*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jim Tolson*, Bill Kidd*, Michael Matheson*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6744 Paisley Pipe Band Championship 2010 (lodged on 16 July 2010) Willie Coffey*, Hugh Henry*
